message: Dave DeLuzio really untrue is you check the non partisan and bipartisan fact checkers. You are reacting to fake news.

Seriously? Painting grass so we don't have to face the problem? How hollywood. Try planting clover instead of grass.. Yes, that stuff you've been paying to spray poison on for years.... It's drought tolerant so stays green, doesn't need mowing as often, long roots aerate the ground (one less thing to pay to have done) Helps honey bees (another thing that's being killed by pesticides and loss of food sources) Doesn't need to be fertilized When you do mow, leave the cuttings to help rebuild the soul Who started this idea that we had to grow grass anyway?
